item.title: Worldwide bat tribute to Hughes
item.description: Australian cricket fans, players are placing bats outside their homes and posting photos on social media in tribute to Phil Hughes, who died aged 25 after being struck by a ball during a match.
item.ExtractedText: Twitter pays tribute to Phil Hughes with #PutOutYourBats By Wilfred Chan, CNN
